meta_title: SafeWork SA Maintenance Compliance: The 2026 Guide & Checklist
meta_description: Master SafeWork SA maintenance compliance requirements (Reg 213). Learn how digital logbooks and Factory AI prevent liability under the WHS Act 2012.
title: SafeWork SA Maintenance Compliance Requirements: The Definitive Guide for 2026

hero_image.alt: Hero image for SafeWork SA Maintenance Compliance Requirements: The Definitive Guide for 2026

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-resolution image inside a modern manufacturing facility in South Australia. The scene features a diverse group of maintenance technicians and a safety manager. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests, and safety glasses. One technician is inspecting a large industrial motor or conveyor belt system, holding a tablet device (showing only the back of the device) to perform a digital check. In the background, there is clean, heavy machinery with yellow safety guarding. The lighting is bright and industrial. The atmosphere conveys safety, professionalism, and modern technology. No text or words should be visible in the image.
